name: Conductor Soppo
description:
Welcome aboard on "Sopmod's" train!

Conductor Soppo  is a free Unity fangame based on the Girls' Frontline franchise, featuring gameplay of an Arcadish type retro game and "borrowed" content from Girls' Frontline.

Lore

For some reason in the Griffin Base there is a challange for not holding the straps on a train. Seems like some dolls are interested in this challange. Too bad that they don't know who the conductor is before boarding...

Features
  • Arcade survival key pressing action!
  • Funny poses of your favourite characters
  • "Masterfully" traced-ish images!
  • Sopmods expertly maneuvers for you to Balance!
  • Cool Taunts to perform on the train. 
  • 4 +1 characters to play around!
  • Bugged holding straps for you to not hold them!
  • Fast opening game for you to play anytime you want!
  • Character voice lines to get yourself immersed.
  • Clickable Sopmod face in the menu!!!

Girls' Frontline is property of MICA, this is a free fangame, no copyright infringement intended.

This is no offical game, not related to anything other than my thoughts. Just using canned characters.

You are free to modify and redistribute the sprite artwork in this game, but please don't charge or make money off of it in any way. Girls' Frontline is property of MICA, you shouldn't be charging for it in the first place.

also just wanted to try gfl version of this already existing game and gave my gimmicks

Cheers!
